SEARCH
Package repositories

Class RequestRepository

java.lang.Object
repositories.RequestRepository
public class RequestRepository extends Object
Stores and retrieves Requests: Registration and Withdrawal. Acts as an in-memory data access layer for requests to Career Center Staff.

    • save

      public void save(Object req)
      Saves a request (either RegistrationRequest or WithdrawalRequest). Automatically routes to the correct list.
      Parameters:
      req - Registration or Withdrawal request
